page.title: 08Tourism
page.content: Coll relies heavily on tourism to keep business going,namely Hotel, Guest House,Shop and Self Catering Accomadation. During the summer months a lot of Yachts visit the island, some for a few hours or perhaps a few days depending on the weather. There can be over 400 yachts in during the season Families with holiday houses are also regular visitors. People with special intrests in bird watching botany,geology and diving visit the island regularly. There are very few recreation facilities provided on the island. People like to make thier own entertainment. Visitors do not come here for an entermianment filled holiday.
